answers.answer: get tested as needles are a risk or transmitting hiv. however this is if you think hat your friends are  high risk. if not then dont worry youll be fine.

question: 1 year ago, me and a couple of friends used the same razor to shave our heads completely.I accidently cut my head a bit.Is there a chance for me to catch HIV from that blade if one of my friends have HIV?Once, I used the diabetes tester with a couple of people.I was the one who used it at last.We shared the same needle.If one of those people have HIV, can I catch HIV from that needle?Please answer my question.I couldn't stop thinking about it.Thanks alot.
title: sharing blade and needle
